title: How to Unlock All Characters in Mario Kart Wii

steps.headline: Get at least 1 Star Rank for all 150cc or 50cc Wii Grand Prix Cups or race in 1,950 races.. Unlocks Baby Daisy.
Win first place in the 150cc Special Cup or race in 2,850 races.. Unlocks Daisy.
Get at least 1 Star Rank for all 100cc Retro Grand Prix Cups.. Unlocks Bowser Jr!
Get at least 1 Star Rank for all 150cc Wii Grand Prix Cups.. Unlocks Dry Bowser.

Attain at least 1 Star Rank for all Mirror Grand Prix Cups, race in 4950 races, or race in 50 races and have Super Mario Galaxy game files saved to your Wii and make sure you have saved the file of the Mii you have in Mario Kart Wii.
Win all 150cc cups.
steps.description: Beat 18 Staff Ghosts. This will also unlock Rosalina.

steps.headline: Unlock all (32) Expert Staff Ghosts in Time Trials or win 5000 Times In Nintendo WFC.

text: Baby Daisy or Daisy Get at least 1 Star Rank for all 150cc or 50cc Wii Grand Prix Cups or race in 1,950 races.. Unlocks Baby Daisy.  Win first place in the 150cc Special Cup or race in 2,850 races.. Unlocks Daisy.  Bowser Jr and Dry Bowser Get at least 1 Star Rank for all 100cc Retro Grand Prix Cups.. Unlocks Bowser Jr!  Get at least 1 Star Rank for all 150cc Wii Grand Prix Cups.. Unlocks Dry Bowser.  Rosalina Attain at least 1 Star Rank for all Mirror Grand Prix Cups, race in 4950 races, or race in 50 races and have Super Mario Galaxy game files saved to your Wii and make sure you have saved the file of the Mii you have in Mario Kart Wii. . Unlocks Rosalina. Win all 150cc cups. Beat 18 Staff Ghosts. This will also unlock Rosalina. Mii Win the 100cc Special Cup. Unlocks Mii (Outfit A). Unlock all (32) Expert Staff Ghosts in Time Trials or win 5000 Times In Nintendo WFC. Unlocks Mii (Outfit B).
